Introduction

Takeru is a Japanese singer and one of the original members of the boy group ONE OR EIGHT.

He began dancing at just 3 years old and trained intensively through his childhood, eventually performing as a backup dancer for renowned artists like Miura Daichi, a celebrated Japanese R&B singer, and SHINee, the legendary K-pop group known for their powerful performances. Takeru later joined WARPs DIG, the group’s survival show, where he successfully earned his spot in the final lineup and officially debuted as part of ONE OR EIGHT.
